H0.text: Which family left Cliveden House in Buckinghamshire shortly after the Profumo Affair of the 1960s. Cavendish

H1.text: Which family left Cliveden House in Buckinghamshire shortly after the Profumo Affair of the 1960s. Churchill

H2.text: Which family left Cliveden House in Buckinghamshire shortly after the Profumo Affair of the 1960s. Rothschild

H3.text: Which family left Cliveden House in Buckinghamshire shortly after the Profumo Affair of the 1960s. ASTOR

A4.text: After the Astor family stopped living there, by the 1970s, it was leased to Stanford University

A5.text: Later, during the early 1960s, when it was the home of the 3rd Viscount Astor, it became the setting for key events of the notorious Profumo affair
